casebody.data:
EX PARTE Nancy BUCKNER, Sam Smith, Pamela McClellan, and Teresa Ellis (employees of Alabama Department of Human Resources and Calhoun County Department of Human Resources) (In re: William David Streip, as personal representative of the Estate of Jerrie Leann Streip
v.
State Department of Human Resources, Nancy Buckner, Leviticus Place, Inc., Calhoun County Department of Human Resources, Sam Smith, Pamela McClellan, and Teresa B. Ellis) 2170589 Court of Civil Appeals of Alabama. March 20, 2018

Transferred to Sup. Ct. for lack of subject-matter jurisdiction.
